title: How to Pray the Chaplet of the Holy Wounds

steps.headline: Begin by praying: "Holy suffering souls, who can obtain so many graces for us, remember me in the midst of your sufferings.
steps.description: I will work unceasingly to obtain for you the joys of Heaven, and I know you will plead for me. Amen."

steps.headline: Make the Sign of the Cross: "In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit.
On the Crucifix pray: "Jesus, Divine Redeemer, be merciful to us and to the whole world.
On the first of three beads pray: "Strong God, Holy God, immortal God, have mercy on us and on the whole world.
On the second bead pray: "Grace and mercy O my Jesus, during present dangers; cover us with thy Precious Blood.
On the third bead pray: "Eternal Father, grant us mercy through the Blood of Jesus Christ, Thine only Son; grant us mercy, we beseech thee.
Repeat the following for each large bead and the ten smaller beads that follow it:On the large bead pray: "Eternal Father, I offer Thee the wounds of our Lord Jesus Christ to heal those of our souls.

Offer a concluding prayer, Prayer for Purity, to Saint Joseph: "O Guardian of Virgins and holy Father St. Joseph, into who faithful keeping were entrusted Christ Jesus, Innocence itself, and Mary, Virgin of virgins, I pray and beseech thee by these dear pledges, Jesus and Mary, that, being preserved from all uncleanness, I may with spotless mind, pure heart and chaste body ever serve Jesus and Mary most chastely all the days of my life.

text:
Begin by praying: "Holy suffering souls, who can obtain so many graces for us, remember me in the midst of your sufferings. I will work unceasingly to obtain for you the joys of Heaven, and I know you will plead for me. Amen." Make the Sign of the Cross: "In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen." On the Crucifix pray: "Jesus, Divine Redeemer, be merciful to us and to the whole world. Amen." On the first of three beads pray: "Strong God, Holy God, immortal God, have mercy on us and on the whole world. Amen." On the second bead pray: "Grace and mercy O my Jesus, during present dangers; cover us with thy Precious Blood. Amen." On the third bead pray: "Eternal Father, grant us mercy through the Blood of Jesus Christ, Thine only Son; grant us mercy, we beseech thee. Amen." Repeat the following for each large bead and the ten smaller beads that follow it:On the large bead pray: "Eternal Father, I offer Thee the wounds of our Lord Jesus Christ to heal those of our souls. "} On each of the 10 beads pray: "My Jesus, pardon and mercy through the merits of Thy Holy Wounds. Amen." {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/04/Pray-the-Chaplet-of-the-Holy-Wounds-Step-7Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Pray-the-Chaplet-of-the-Holy-Wounds-Step-7Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/04/Pray-the-Chaplet-of-the-Holy-Wounds-Step-7Bullet2.jpg/v4-760px-Pray-the-Chaplet-of-the-Holy-Wounds-Step-7Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":344,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":567.9120879120879,"licensing":"

"} Offer a concluding prayer, Prayer for Purity, to Saint Joseph: "O Guardian of Virgins and holy Father St. Joseph, into who faithful keeping were entrusted Christ Jesus, Innocence itself, and Mary, Virgin of virgins, I pray and beseech thee by these dear pledges, Jesus and Mary, that, being preserved from all uncleanness, I may with spotless mind, pure heart and chaste body ever serve Jesus and Mary most chastely all the days of my life. Amen.
sentences: Begin by praying: "Holy suffering souls, who can obtain so many graces for us, remember me in the midst of your sufferings.
I will work unceasingly to obtain for you the joys of Heaven, and I know you will plead for me.
Make the Sign of the Cross: "In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit.
On the Crucifix pray: "Jesus, Divine Redeemer, be merciful to us and to the whole world.
On the first of three beads pray: "Strong God, Holy God, immortal God, have mercy on us and on the whole world.
On the second bead pray: "Grace and mercy O my Jesus, during present dangers; cover us with thy Precious Blood.
On the third bead pray: "Eternal Father, grant us mercy through the Blood of Jesus Christ, Thine only Son; grant us mercy, we beseech thee.
Repeat the following for each large bead and the ten smaller beads that follow it:On the large bead pray: "Eternal Father, I offer Thee the wounds of our Lord Jesus Christ to heal those of our souls.
